column4: does anyone know why ubuntu breezy would not be detecting my wireless cart?
you need to tell us what sort of card it is, and define "detecting"
ipw2100, and when I got to networking I only see 1 ethernet card and no choice to add another
got to networking = "using some gnome configuration tool"? ignore it.
it prints nothing in the terminal
it prints nothing in the terminal
nope, I enter the text and it just gives me robert@chay~$
what? modprobe does not print anything.
now run lsmod | grep ipw again
it seems when I grep ipw it detects something
what do you mean by setting it up?
